page.title: 03A Walk East of Fulwood.
page.content: On Thursday the 20th of June 1985 we walked down Sharoe Green Lane and passed an old converted barn which was made into a farmhouse on Shire Bank farm. We carried on down the road and passed Fairways which has mostly detached houses but has some bungalows. Next we passed The Paddock which has a laundry for people who live in flats, a telephone, a Surgery and a pond, which has fish and frogs in it.We passed a house and orchard called Fern Bank. Next to Fern Bank are new detached houses that cost a lot of money. We went on and were told that the bridge used to be the main road. In five minutes we were standing on an old tram bridge which passed over the brook. Then we went on to the golf course.
